keyMoments.title: Ivankov's Role Revealed
keyMoments.description: Ivankov reveals he is a commander in the Revolutionary Army and that his connection to Dragon is why he was imprisoned in Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Provides important information about the Revolutionary Army's structure and the World Government's efforts to suppress it.

keyMoments.title: Connection to Luffy Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Revolutionary Army's connection to Luffy is established when Ivankov learns that Luffy is Dragon's son.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a direct link between the Straw Hat Pirates and the Revolutionary Army that will have implications for future story developments.

reveals.information: Emporio Ivankov is a commander of the Revolutionary Army
Inazuma is an officer of the Revolutionary Army
The World Government imprisons Revolutionary Army members in Impel Down

description: A global organization led by Monkey D. Dragon that seeks to overthrow the World Government. Members are imprisoned in Impel Down if captured.
